vstore.framework.context

Class RuleContextDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • vstore.framework.context.RuleContextDescription

  • public class RuleContextDescription
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates the context data that a rule can be configured to contain. This does not extend ContextDescription, because the contained context types are somewhat different.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      private ActivityType mActivityContext 
      private VLatLng mLocation

    • Constructor Detail

      • RuleContextDescription

        public RuleContextDescription()
        Constructs an empty RuleContextDescription object that contains no configured context data. Configure the context data by using the .set*Context methods.

      • RuleContextDescription

        public RuleContextDescription(org.json.simple.JSONObject j)

      • RuleContextDescription

        public RuleContextDescription(java.lang.String json)
                       throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Constructs a new rule context description based on the given JSON string.
        Parameters:
        json - The json string
        Throws:
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - in case the given JSON is malformed.

    • Method Detail

      • setLocationContext

        public void setLocationContext(double lat,
                               double lng,
                               int radius)
        Sets the location data for the rule context description object.
        Parameters:
        lat - The latitude for the location
        lng - The longitude for the location
        radius - The radius for the location in meters. If location is within the radius, this context is fulfilled.

      • setPlaceTypes

        public void setPlaceTypes(java.util.List<PlaceType> types)
        Sets the place types for the rule to the given list of place types.
        Parameters:
        types - The list containing the new place types.

      • addPlaceType

        public void addPlaceType(PlaceType type)
        Adds a place type to this rule context description.
        Parameters:
        type - The place type to add.

      • removePlaceType

        public void removePlaceType(PlaceType type)

      • setActivityContext

        public void setActivityContext(ActivityType activity)
        Sets the activity for this rule context description. For possible activities see ActivityType. This activity has to be fulfilled together with the other context so that the rule can trigger.
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity to be set for the rule.

      • setNetworkContext

        public void setNetworkContext(VNetwork network)
        Sets the network context for this rule context description. This condition has to be fulfilled for the rule to trigger (given that all other context is fulfilled).
        Parameters:
        network - The network context data.

      • setNoiseContext

        public void setNoiseContext(VNoise noise)
        Sets the noise context for this rule context description. The rule can only fire, if this context is fulfilled together with the other context that is configured.
        Parameters:
        noise - The noise context data.

      • getLocationContext

        public VLatLng getLocationContext()
        Returns the location context of the rule context description.
        Returns:
        The VLatLng object containing the location that has to be matched for the rule to trigger.

      • getRadius

        public int getRadius()
        Returns the radius for the location in meters. If the user's location is within this radius, the location context is fulfilled.
        Returns:
        The radius in meters.

      • getPlaceTypes

        public java.util.List<PlaceType> getPlaceTypes()
        Returns the place types of the rule context description. The rule triggers, if all other context is matched and one place from this list is given in the current context.
        Returns:
        A list containing all place types that are set for the rule.

      • getActivityContext

        public ActivityType getActivityContext()
        Returns the activity of the rule context description. The rule triggers, if all other context is matched and the activity is given in the current context.
        Returns:
        The activity for the rule.

      • getNetworkContext

        public VNetwork getNetworkContext()
        Returns the network context configured for the rule context description. The rule triggers, if all other context is matched and these network conditions are met.
        Returns:
        The network context for the rule.

      • getNoiseContext

        public VNoise getNoiseContext()
        Returns the noise context configured for the rule context description. The rule triggers, if all other context is matched and these noise conditions are met.
        Returns:
        The noise context for the rule.

      • getJson

        public org.json.simple.JSONObject getJson()

      • hasLocationContext

        public boolean hasLocationContext()
        Returns:
        True, if the location context is configured.

      • hasPlaceContext

        public boolean hasPlaceContext()
        Returns:
        True, if place type context is configured.

      • hasActivityContext

        public boolean hasActivityContext()
        Returns:
        True, if activity context is configured.

      • hasNetworkContext

        public boolean hasNetworkContext()
        Returns:
        True, if the rule has network context configured.

      • hasNoiseContext

        public boolean hasNoiseContext()
        Returns:
        True, if noise context is configured.

      • clearLocationContext

        public void clearLocationContext()
        Clears the location context from this rule context description.

      • clearPlaceContext

        public void clearPlaceContext()
        Clears the place context from this rule context description.

      • clearActivityContext

        public void clearActivityContext()
        Clears the activity context from this rule context description.

      • clearNetworkContext

        public void clearNetworkContext()
        Clears the network context from this rule context description.

      • clearNoiseContext

        public void clearNoiseContext()
        Clears the noise context from this rule context description.
